TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi SendKeys extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供傳送按鍵至應用程式的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for sending keystrokes to an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用傳送按鍵和按鍵組合，作用中的應用程式。Use to send keystrokes and keystroke combinations to the active application. 無法執行個體化這個類別。This class cannot be instantiated. 按鍵動作傳送至類別，並且立即繼續您的程式流程，請使用。To send a keystroke to a class and immediately continue with the flow of your program, use . 若要等待按鍵動作來啟動任何處理序，請使用。To wait for any processes started by the keystroke, use . 每個索引鍵是由一個或多個字元表示。Each key is represented by one or more characters. 若要指定鍵盤字元，請使用字元本身。To specify a single keyboard character, use the character itself. 例如，代表字母 A，傳遞字串"A"中方法。For example, to represent the letter A, pass in the string "A" to the method. 若要顯示多個字元，將附加至先前的每個字元。To represent more than one character, append each additional character to the one preceding it. 若要表示字母 A、 B 和 C，指定為"ABC"的參數。To represent the letters A, B, and C, specify the parameter as "ABC". 加號 （+）、 插入號 (^)、 百分比符號 （%）、 波狀符號 （~） 和括號 （） 有特殊意義。The plus sign (+), caret (^), percent sign (%), tilde (~), and parentheses () have special meanings to . 若要指定其中一個字元，請將它括在括號 ({})。To specify one of these characters, enclose it within braces ({}). 例如，若要指定加號，使用"{+}"。For example, to specify the plus sign, use "{+}". 若要指定的大括號字元，請使用"{{}"和"{}}"。To specify brace characters, use "{{}" and "{}}". 括號 ([]) 有沒有特殊意義，但您必須將其括在括號中。Brackets ([ ]) have no special meaning to , but you must enclose them in braces. 其他應用程式，在方括號沒有特殊意義，特別是當動態資料交換 (DDE)，就會發生。In other applications, brackets do have a special meaning that might be significant when dynamic data exchange (DDE) occurs. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您的應用程式是設計成可搭配國際上現有的各種鍵盤來使用，則使用 可能會產生無法預期的結果，應該予以避免。If your application is intended for international use with a variety of keyboards, the use of could yield unpredictable results and should be avoided. 若要指定不會顯示當您按下 ENTER 或索引標籤上，等動作，而不是字元，代表索引鍵的索引鍵的字元使用下表中的代碼。To specify characters that aren't displayed when you press a key, such as ENTER or TAB, and keys that represent actions rather than characters, use the codes in the following table. |KeyKey|程式碼Code| |---------|----------| |退格鍵BACKSPACE|{退格鍵}，{BS，} 或 {BKSP}{BACKSPACE}, {BS}, or {BKSP}| |中斷BREAK|{BREAK}{BREAK}| |CAPS LOCKCAPS LOCK|{CAPSLOCK}{CAPSLOCK}| |DEL 或刪除DEL or DELETE|{刪除} 或 {刪除}{DELETE} or {DEL}| |向下鍵DOWN ARROW|{DOWN}{DOWN}| |ENDEND|{結束}{END}| |ENTERENTER|{輸入} 或 ~{ENTER}or ~| |ESCESC|{ESC}{ESC}| |說明HELP|{HELP}{HELP}| |首頁HOME|{首頁}{HOME}| |單元或插入INS or INSERT|{插入} 或 {單元}{INSERT} or {INS}| |向左鍵LEFT ARROW|{LEFT}{LEFT}| |NUM LOCKNUM LOCK|{NUMLOCK}{NUMLOCK}| |PAGE DOWNPAGE DOWN|{PGDN}{PGDN}| |PAGE UPPAGE UP|{PGUP}{PGUP}| |PRINT SCREEN 鍵PRINT SCREEN|{PRTSC}（保留供日後使用）{PRTSC} (reserved for future use)| |向右鍵RIGHT ARROW|{右邊}{RIGHT}| |捲動鎖定SCROLL LOCK|{SCROLLLOCK}{SCROLLLOCK}| |TABTAB|{TAB}{TAB}| |向上鍵UP ARROW|{UP}{UP}| |F1F1|{F1}{F1}| |F2F2|{F2}{F2}| |F3F3|{F3}{F3}| |F4F4|{F4}{F4}| |F5F5|{F5}{F5}| |F6F6|{F6}{F6}| |F7F7|{F7}{F7}| |F8F8|{F8}{F8}| |F9F9|{F9}{F9}| |F10F10|{F10}{F10}| |F11F11|{F11}{F11}| |F12F12|{F12}{F12}| |F13F13|{F13}{F13}| |F14F14|{F14}{F14}| |F15F15|{F15}{F15}| |F16F16|{F16}{F16}| |將數字鍵台Keypad add|{ADD}{ADD}| |減去數字鍵台Keypad subtract|{減去}{SUBTRACT}| |相乘的數字鍵台Keypad multiply|{乘}{MULTIPLY}| |數字鍵台除以Keypad divide|{DIVIDE}{DIVIDE}| 若要指定索引鍵結合的 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 鍵的任何組合，在之前的按鍵碼和一或多個下列的程式碼。To specify keys combined with any combination of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, precede the key code with one or more of the following codes. |KeyKey|程式碼Code| |---------|----------| |SHIFT 鍵SHIFT|+| |CTRLCTRL|^| |ALT 鍵ALT|%| 若要指定的任何組合的 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 alt 鍵應該按住時按下其他幾個索引鍵，將這些機碼的程式碼括在括號中。To specify that any combination of SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT should be held down while several other keys are pressed, enclose the code for those keys in parentheses. 例如，若要指定按住 shift 鍵，E 和 C 按下時，使用"+ (EC)"。For example, to specify to hold down SHIFT while E and C are pressed, use "+(EC)". 若要指定按住 shift 鍵，E 按下，後面接著不 shift 鍵，C 時使用"+ EC"。To specify to hold down SHIFT while E is pressed, followed by C without SHIFT, use "+EC". 若要指定重複的索引鍵，使用表單 {索引鍵的數目}。To specify repeating keys, use the form {key number}. 您必須將索引鍵和數字之間的空格。You must put a space between key and number. 例如，{左 42} 表示 42 倍; 按向左鍵{h 10} 表示按下 H 10 倍。For example, {LEFT 42} means press the LEFT ARROW key 42 times; {h 10} means press H 10 times. > [!NOTE] > 因為沒有可啟動另一個應用程式的 managed 的方法，您可以使用這個類別，在目前應用程式或使用原生 Windows 方法，例如`FindWindow`和`SetForegroundWindow`，強制將焦點放在其他應用程式。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application or use native Windows methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. > [!NOTE] > 類別已針對 .NET Framework 3.0 進行更新，以便能夠在 Windows Vista 上執行的應用程式中使用。The class has been updated for the .NET Framework 3.0 to enable its use in applications that run on Windows Vista. Windows Vista 的增強式安全性 (稱為使用者帳戶控制或 UAC) 會讓之前的實作無法如預期般運作。The enhanced security of Windows Vista (known as User Account Control or UAC) prevents the previous implementation from working as expected. > > 類別容易受到時間問題的影響，某些開發人員必須解決這些問題。The class is susceptible to timing issues, which some developers have had to work around. 更新的實作仍然容易受到時間問題的影響，但是速度會稍微快一些，而且可能需要對解決方法進行變更。The updated implementation is still susceptible to timing issues, but is slightly faster and may require changes to the workarounds. 類別會先嘗試使用之前的實作；如果失敗，則使用新的實作。The class tries to use the previous implementation first, and if that fails, uses the new implementation. 因此， 類別在不同的作業系統上可能會有不同的運作方式。As a result, the class may behave differently on different operating systems. 此外，當 類別使用新的實作時， 方法不會在將訊息傳送至另一個處理序時，等候處理這些訊息。Additionally, when the class uses the new implementation, the method will not wait for messages to be processed when they are sent to another process. > > 如果不論作業系統為何，應用程式都需要一致的行為，您可以強制 類別使用新的實作，方式是將下列應用程式設定加入 app.config 檔中。If your application relies on consistent behavior regardless of the operating system, you can force the class to use the new implementation by adding the following application setting to your app.config file. > > `` > > `` > > `` > > 若要強制 類別使用之前的實作，請改用 `"JournalHook"` 值。To force the class to use the previous implementation, use the value `"JournalHook"` instead. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼呼叫 Form1 表單中包含按鈕呼叫 Button1。To run the example, paste the following code in a form called Form1 containing a button called Button1. 確定按一下事件與事件處理方法在此範例中相關聯。Ensure the click events are associated with their event-handling methods in this example. 按鈕控制項的屬性應該設定為 0。The button control's property should be set to 0. 當執行範例時，按兩下表單，以觸發按鈕的 click 事件。When the example is running, double-click the form to trigger the button's click event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 處理目前在訊息佇列中的所有 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes all the Windows messages currently in the message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用等候應用程式處理的按鍵和其他訊息佇列中的作業系統訊息。Use to wait for the application to process keystrokes and other operating system messages that are in the message queue. 這就相當於呼叫之前有未處理的更多索引鍵。This is equivalent to calling until there are no more keys to process. > [!NOTE] > 因為沒有可啟動另一個應用程式的 managed 的方法，您可以使用這個類別，在目前應用程式或使用原生 Windows 方法，例如`FindWindow`和`SetForegroundWindow`，強制將焦點放在其他應用程式。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application or use native Windows methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Send(string keys) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Send (keys As String)

span.span: The string of keystrokes to send.

summary.span: 傳送按鍵至使用中的應用程式。

span.span: Sends keystrokes to the active application.

been updated for the .NET Framework 3.0 to enable its use in applications that run on Windows Vista. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SendKeys/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 沒有可傳送按鍵的目標使用中應用程式。

span.span: There is not an active application to send keystrokes to.

permission.span: 呼叫這個方法的 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for unmanaged code to call this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SendWait(string keys) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SendWait (keys As String)

span.span: The string of keystrokes to send.

summary.span: 傳送指定的按鍵至使用中的應用程式，然後等待訊息的處理。

span.span: Sends the given keys to the active application, and then waits for the messages to be processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用將按鍵組合傳送至作用中的應用程式，並等待要處理的按鍵輸入訊息。Use to send keystrokes or combinations of keystrokes to the active application and wait for the keystroke messages to be processed. 您可以使用這個方法來傳送按鍵至應用程式，並等候完成的按鍵啟動任何處理程序。You can use this method to send keystrokes to an application and wait for any processes that are started by the keystrokes to be completed. 這可以是很重要，如果其他應用程式必須完成才能繼續執行您的應用程式。This can be important if the other application must finish before your application can continue. > [!NOTE] > 因為沒有可啟動另一個應用程式的 managed 的方法，您可以使用這個類別，在目前應用程式或使用原生 Windows 方法，例如`FindWindow`和`SetForegroundWindow`，強制將焦點放在其他應用程式。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application or use native Windows methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. > [!NOTE] > 類別已針對 .NET Framework 3.0 進行更新，以便能夠在 Windows Vista 上執行的應用程式中使用。The class has been updated for the .NET Framework 3.0 to enable its use in applications that run on Windows Vista. Windows Vista 的增強式安全性 (稱為使用者帳戶控制或 UAC) 會讓之前的實作無法如預期般運作。The enhanced security of Windows Vista (known as User Account Control or UAC) prevents the previous implementation from working as expected. > > 類別容易受到時間問題的影響，某些開發人員必須解決這些問題。The class is susceptible to timing issues, which some developers have had to work around. 更新的實作仍然容易受到時間問題的影響，但是速度會稍微快一些，而且可能需要對解決方法進行變更。The updated implementation is still susceptible to timing issues, but is slightly faster and may require changes to the workarounds. 類別會先嘗試使用之前的實作；如果失敗，則使用新的實作。The class tries to use the previous implementation first, and if that fails, uses the new implementation. 因此， 類別在不同的作業系統上可能會有不同的運作方式。As a result, the class may behave differently on different operating systems. 此外，當 類別使用新的實作時， 方法不會在將訊息傳送至另一個處理序時，等候處理這些訊息。Additionally, when the class uses the new implementation, the method will not wait for messages to be processed when they are sent to another process. > > 如果不論作業系統為何，應用程式都需要一致的行為，您可以強制 類別使用新的實作，方式是將下列應用程式設定加入 app.config 檔中。If your application relies on consistent behavior regardless of the operating system, you can force the class to use the new implementation by adding the following application setting to your app.config file. > > `` > > `` > > `` > > 若要強制 類別使用之前的實作，請改用 `"JournalHook"` 值。To force the class to use the previous implementation, use the value `"JournalHook"` instead.

permission.span: 呼叫這個方法的 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for unmanaged code to call this method.
